name: Zombie Cannon Attack!
description:
Launch test zombies to infect the local populace and create your very own rampaging zombie horde. Gather data and use it to upgrade your zombies and build the perfect undead army, then sit back and enjoy the hilarious screams of your terrified victims. Great Fun!

Features:

Halloween Update Special!
Witches
Cauldrons
Pumpkins
A Big Cannon
Zombies
People for the zombies to infect
Nearly 50 Medals and Achievements
A Mad Scientist hell bent on world domination
Tons of upgrades to buy
Loads of screaming
Guns
Bullets for the guns
Crates and walls to smash with your fingers and thumbs
Brains to collect (squelchy)
Superheroes
A UFO
Small amounts of pixelated blood and vomit

Free demo version available on Kongregate
